name: Accomplished Sneak Attacker
text: Your strikes against a foe’s vital spots are extra deadly.
benefit: Your sneak attack damage increases by 1d6. Your number of sneak attack dice cannot exceed half your character level (rounded up).
text_zh: 只要能偷袭的，就是神也杀给你看！
benefit_zh: 你的偷袭伤害上升+1d6，但是你的偷袭伤害骰数最多不超过你的角色等级的一半（向上取整）。
